Title: Criminalizes the theft of a catalytic converter; imposes restrictions on the purchase, sale and possession of catalytic converters by certain entities
Summary: Criminalizes the theft of a catalytic converter; includes possession of a stolen catalytic converter in the definition of criminal possession of stolen property in the fourth degree; imposes restrictions on the purchase, sale and possession of catalytic converters by vehicle dismantlers, salvage pools, mobile car crushers, itinerant vehicle collectors and scrap processors.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to criminalizing the theft of a catalytic converter; and to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to imposing restrictions on the purchase, sale and possession of catalytic converters by vehicle dismantlers, salvage pools, mobile car crushers, itinerant vehicle collectors and scrap processors
